original_title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs20.6bn Treasury bills after auction
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has sold 20.6 billion rupees of treasury bills offered on tap at average rates of 8.69%, 8.88% and 9.07%, the state debt office said.
On Wednesday (11) the debt office raised 206 billion rupees of 3, 6 and 12 month bills.
Sri Lanka sells Rs206bn in treasury bills, yields down across maturities
